item.description:
The JULY Permaculture Meetup is happening in Gorham - about 11 miles SW of Portland.

This will be a *potluck* event, with grazing starting around 6:30 and the regular meeting starting at 7:00.

In JUNE we talked about permaculture concepts like EDGE and STACKING FUNCTIONS. So, in JULY let's focus on the fairly large topic of PATTERNS & MICROCLIMATES.

Recommended reading:


http://en.wikipedia.o...
http://www.patternlan...
http://www.rosneath.c...

about photography, but still interesting:
http://www.cameraonth...



Feel free to start discussion threads in the Message Board area.....

We will be learning from each other on mini permaculture topics as well as planning for upcoming events and outreach. If there's a topic you'd like to talk about, just let us know!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: The Portland Maine Permaculture July Meetup
